LABEL: 0x25F
STRING: 「That's an interesting outfit.」

LABEL: 0x284
STRING: The rear section, in front of the elevator shaft.

LABEL: 0x2B4
STRING: I was in my diving suit.

LABEL: 0x2D8
STRING: Countless empty plastic bottles were tied to my body.

LABEL: 0x320
STRING: "Dividing Dry" could be seen inscribed on the labels of the bottles.

LABEL: 0x385
STRING: 「"Dividing Dryman"...」

LABEL: 0x418
STRING: 「Can I shake your hand?」

LABEL: 0x459
STRING: I wordlessly shook Tokiwa's outstretched hand.

LABEL: 0x493
STRING: Why was this happening?

LABEL: 0x4C3
STRING: How did things end up like this?

LABEL: 0x644
STRING: 「You have to lift your body up one floor with just the help of a wire.」

LABEL: 0x70E
STRING: 「If there's a way to increase your buoyancy even a little, it should be employed.」

LABEL: 0x7BE
STRING: 「Oh, there's a huge amount of Dividing Dry here for some reason...」

LABEL: 0x878
STRING: 「Huh? You want to empty them into the sink?」

LABEL: 0x8A4
STRING: 「Wasting food is bad.」

LABEL: 0x944
STRING: 「Let's empty the bottles into this bag for now and save it for later.」

LABEL: 0x9FE
STRING: 「We'll throw a party once Katagiri-san gets back.」

LABEL: 0xC21
STRING: 「Please bear with it.」

LABEL: 0xC43
STRING: 「You might look ridiculous, but you should be buoyant enough now.」

LABEL: 0xC84
STRING: 「...Right.」

LABEL: 0xC9E
STRING: Despite her words, Yukari was stifling a laugh.

LABEL: 0xCCC
STRING: This was no way to treat a man who was about to embark on another journey into the deep sea, was it?

LABEL: 0xD1E
STRING: What did I do wrong?

LABEL: 0xD44
STRING: Should I have asked them to remove the labels as well when emptying the bottles?

LABEL: 0xD9A
STRING: Between the macaroni penguin and Dividing Dryman...

LABEL: 0xDE4
STRING: Why couldn't I look cool for once...?

LABEL: 0xE5A
STRING: Well, there was no point in lamenting.

LABEL: 0xE9C
STRING: 「All right, let's go.」

LABEL: 0xEBA
STRING: Having made up my mind, I entered the elevator.

LABEL: 0xFBD
STRING: 「Stay there for a moment.」

LABEL: 0xFE1
STRING: 「We'll go back to the wheelhouse.」

LABEL: 0x1018
STRING: 「Yeah. I'm counting on you.」

LABEL: 0x1043
STRING: 「...Godspeed.」

LABEL: 0x10A8
STRING: While grabbing the toolbox, I climbed into the shaft.

LABEL: 0x11CB
STRING: ...The door was closed.

LABEL: 0x11EF
STRING: This is it, huh?

LABEL: 0x1236
STRING: 『...Can you hear me?』

LABEL: 0x125D
STRING: 「Loud and clear.」

LABEL: 0x127F
STRING: Water began pouring in as soon as I replied.

LABEL: 0x12A7
STRING: A thunderous roar could be heard even inside the diving suit.

LABEL: 0x12D5
STRING: The water level in the shaft rose with tremendous force.

LABEL: 0x130F
STRING: 「There doesn't seem to be any water leaking out of the shaft at the moment.」

LABEL: 0x134B
STRING: 「It should be fine...」

LABEL: 0x1380
STRING: 『That's good.』

LABEL: 0x13A3
STRING: Just like that, the water level had already reached my face.

LABEL: 0x13E5
STRING: And then――

LABEL: 0x145A
STRING: ――Darkness.

LABEL: 0x1472
STRING: I turned on the night vision with a practiced hand.

LABEL: 0x151A
STRING: 『The flooding is now done.』

LABEL: 0x153F
STRING: 「Right, I'll be going then.」

LABEL: 0x155B
STRING: I put my hands on the wire.

LABEL: 0x158D
STRING: Firmly, I grabbed the wire and pulled myself up.

LABEL: 0x15CD
STRING: There was a sensation of my body floating.

LABEL: 0x15F9
STRING: My body felt lighter than I expected.

LABEL: 0x161D
STRING: It was as if I wasn't wearing this heavy diving suit at all.

LABEL: 0x166F
STRING: With little to no difficulty, I climbed up the shaft using the wire.

LABEL: 0x16B9
STRING: That was Tokiwa for you... Her calculations were worthy of being called a genius.

LABEL: 0x16F7
STRING: The pull of gravity felt soft and gentle, like I was in the cold outer space.

LABEL: 0x173B
STRING: However, that's right...

LABEL: 0x1757
STRING: This was the deep sea.

LABEL: 0x1773
STRING: There was a sense of resuscitation――

LABEL: 0x1793
STRING: ――And so, I descended to the bottom of the sea once again.

LABEL: 0x1824
STRING: This was my third time in the deep sea.

LABEL: 0x1842
STRING: But this time, it was different.

LABEL: 0x1862
STRING: I now knew how terrifying this sea was.

LABEL: 0x188C
STRING: I felt a sense of dread that made me want to turn around at once.

LABEL: 0x18D6
STRING: I was going back down the same path. Like replaying a video.

LABEL: 0x1914
STRING: Even so, I couldn't turn back.

LABEL: 0x19E4
STRING: But――

LABEL: 0x19FC
STRING: I wondered why.

LABEL: 0x1A16
STRING: My fear disappeared in an instant.

LABEL: 0x1A3C
STRING: Ah... That's right.

LABEL: 0x1A5A
STRING: Wasn't this enough already?

LABEL: 0x1A7C
STRING: I was reminded of a passage I had once read in a book.

LABEL: 0x1AAC
STRING: It was said that all natural movements of the soul were governed by laws similar to the laws of gravity in matter.

LABEL: 0x1B0C
STRING: The sole power that could release us from sinking and being pulled to the depths by gravity, was the grace of God.

LABEL: 0x1B66
STRING: That was what the woman had written at a young age before passing away.

LABEL: 0x1BA6
STRING: And now, for the first time, I felt like I was floating in this dark and cold sea.

LABEL: 0x1BF2
STRING: We had already lost so many things.

LABEL: 0x1C1A
STRING: There was no end to our despair.

LABEL: 0x1C4C
STRING: And because of that, I prayed.

LABEL: 0x1C74
STRING: To those left behind at the depths of this sea――

LABEL: 0x1D14
STRING: ――May they receive the grace of God.

LABEL: 0x1D4F
STRING: 『How are you faring, Katagiri-san?』

LABEL: 0x1D7E
STRING: 「Well...」

LABEL: 0x1D98
STRING: 「I feel like I've come to a nostalgic place.」

LABEL: 0x1DDF
STRING: 『What?』

LABEL: 0x1DFA
STRING: 「No, never mind.」

LABEL: 0x1E20
STRING: 「I'm off.」

LABEL: 0x1E99
STRING: What was lost couldn't be regained.

LABEL: 0x1EBD
STRING: I had to move forward.

LABEL: 0x1EE1
STRING: For the sake of our goal――

LABEL: 0x1EFF
STRING: To put an end to this.

LABEL: 0x1F21
STRING: And so, after some time, I reached the front of the ladder extending from the front section.

LABEL: 0x204A
STRING: Above the ladder and beyond it...

LABEL: 0x2070
STRING: I saw a large shadow.

LABEL: 0x2090
STRING: That was it―the rescue ship.

LABEL: 0x20CA
STRING: I slowly climbed the ladder as I approached it.

LABEL: 0x20F4
STRING: It was only natural, but it looked a lot bigger now than it did from the inside.

LABEL: 0x213E
STRING: I was overwhelmed at first glance.

LABEL: 0x21BF
STRING: By the size of the rescue ship and by the size of the <SHEEP III>, which was many times larger.

LABEL: 0x220C
STRING: Both were the end result of human wisdom, the end result of civilization.

LABEL: 0x2242
STRING: The mere sight of them left me feeling powerless.

LABEL: 0x22B1
STRING: I climbed the ladder.

LABEL: 0x22D1
STRING: I reached the rescue ship.

LABEL: 0x22F1
STRING: The ballast was right in front of me.

LABEL: 0x2319
STRING: It was a flat lump of metal attached to the bottom of the submarine.

LABEL: 0x2357
STRING: This was what served as a weight to sink the submarine, and as such, it had a mass-like appearance.

LABEL: 0x23C9
STRING: I reached out and put my hand on the ballast.

LABEL: 0x2474
STRING: It didn't budge an inch.

LABEL: 0x2492
STRING: Now that I took a closer look, there was a sturdy-looking hook-shaped object fixed to it.

LABEL: 0x2539
STRING: 「This is――」

LABEL: 0x2555
STRING: It looked like it was locked up pretty tight, so how was I supposed to get it off...?

LABEL: 0x25AD
STRING: I had brought some tools with me, but I wasn't sure how much help they would be here.

LABEL: 0x25FF
STRING: There was no way I had the tools to release such a sturdy lock.

LABEL: 0x2643
STRING: I'd come this far, and now I was stuck yet again――

LABEL: 0x26A2
STRING: 『Is something wrong?』

LABEL: 0x26E9
STRING: Suddenly, a familiar voice reached me through the speaker.

LABEL: 0x2721
STRING: That's right.

LABEL: 0x2737
STRING: I wasn't alone.

LABEL: 0x2768
STRING: 『Is there a problem?』

LABEL: 0x278D
STRING: 「No, it's nothing.」

LABEL: 0x27B1
STRING: 「...Thanks.」

LABEL: 0x282E
STRING: ...I had to calm down.

LABEL: 0x284E
STRING: I took a deep breath.

LABEL: 0x286E
STRING: According to Yukari, the ballast was designed so that it could be manually removed from the outside.

LABEL: 0x28D4
STRING: Which meant that there had to be a key nearby to unlock this lock.

LABEL: 0x2922
STRING: I kept my feet on the ladder and looked around the area near the ballast.

LABEL: 0x2968
STRING: ――And, there it was.

LABEL: 0x2992
STRING: At the joint between the ballast and the rescue ship.

LABEL: 0x29BE
STRING: There was a small lever there.

LABEL: 0x2A5B
STRING: I pulled it.

LABEL: 0x2A77
STRING: The hook moved.

LABEL: 0x2A95
STRING: From there, it was as if I was watching a slow-motion video.

LABEL: 0x2AE5
STRING: The ballast was now unfastened after the hook was out of the way.

LABEL: 0x2B1F
STRING: Losing its balance,

LABEL: 0x2B47
STRING: the lump of metal obeyed the weak gravity and began to fall.

LABEL: 0x2B71
STRING: Falling downwards――

LABEL: 0x2BF2
STRING: Sand scattered around where it fell.

LABEL: 0x2C10
STRING: ――I was still standing on the ladder.

LABEL: 0x2C40
STRING: I watched as a cloud rose up from below me.

LABEL: 0x2C78
STRING: Countless grains of sand flew up in an instant and slowly rained down toward the bottom of the sea.

LABEL: 0x2CD0
STRING: The sea was quietly stirring.

LABEL: 0x2D00
STRING: Time flowed slowly.

LABEL: 0x2D1E
STRING: Why did this scene seem so serene, I wondered.

LABEL: 0x2D4C
STRING: It evoked a feeling of beauty and sadness at the same time.

LABEL: 0x2D7A
STRING: I was sure that once all the sand had once again settled, the fact that the ballast had fallen would be completely forgotten.

LABEL: 0x2DE6
STRING: The sea would no doubt accept the lump of metal lying solemnly on the ground as a part of itself.

LABEL: 0x2E48
STRING: If we didn't give it meaning,

LABEL: 0x2E96
STRING: the seafloor would surely remain there forever in silence.

LABEL: 0x2ED6
STRING: And, the <SHEEP III> as well――

LABEL: 0x2F74
STRING: Many lives had been lost.

LABEL: 0x2F98
STRING: They had all died in this sea.

LABEL: 0x2FC2
STRING: My sister as well, seven years ago...

LABEL: 0x2FE8
STRING: As I turned my head forward again, I saw marine snow raining down on me.

LABEL: 0x3083
STRING: Their remains fell more gently than the snow on the surface.

LABEL: 0x30C1
STRING: We lived only for a brief moment in an endless cycle of death.

LABEL: 0x3105
STRING: If everyone eventually returned to death and drifted off into the world as snow, how much meaning could we say there was in a life like that?

LABEL: 0x317B
STRING: Life that would only end up as piled-up dust.

LABEL: 0x31BB
STRING: ...If I listened closely...

LABEL: 0x31DB
STRING: At the bottom of this deep sea, in this vast silence, a low sound reached my ears.

LABEL: 0x321D
STRING: Was it a dolphin? Or maybe a whale?

LABEL: 0x324F
STRING: The reverberations of lost friends, repeating endlessly.

LABEL: 0x3293
STRING: The voices of the dead were still echoing at the bottom of this sea.

LABEL: 0x32D0
STRING: 『What was that sound just now?』

LABEL: 0x3303
STRING: 『Katagiri-san―!』

LABEL: 0x3328
STRING: But still.

LABEL: 0x33AF
STRING: We were alive.

LABEL: 0x33D5
STRING: No matter how insignificant we were,

LABEL: 0x33F9
STRING: no matter how soon we would be forgotten, no matter who we were, we were definitely alive right now.

LABEL: 0x3467
STRING: There didn't have to be any meaning in it.

LABEL: 0x348F
STRING: These lives could end tomorrow, crushed inside this ship.

LABEL: 0x34CB
STRING: Still, that was fine.

LABEL: 0x354F
STRING: ...Survive.

LABEL: 0x356F
STRING: Yukari and Tokiwa were going make it out of here alive――

LABEL: 0x3608
STRING: 「It's done...」

LABEL: 0x3635
STRING: 『Huh?』

LABEL: 0x3650
STRING: 「I removed the ballast.」

LABEL: 0x3672
STRING: 「I'm on my way back.」

LABEL: 0x369D
STRING: 『Got it!』

LABEL: 0x36BA
STRING: Her voice boomed through the speaker.

LABEL: 0x36E2
STRING: The preparations were now complete.

LABEL: 0x36FE
STRING: So come on, let's go back.

LABEL: 0x371A
STRING: Back to those two――

LABEL: 0x378F
STRING: ...Then, suddenly, a small warning sound rang out.

LABEL: 0x37BF
STRING: Feeling like the wind was taken out of my sails, I looked down at the source of the sound. It was the gauge at the waist of my diving suit.

LABEL: 0x38BA
STRING: There was no response from the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x38E0
STRING: They didn't seem to hear the electronic sound over there.

LABEL: 0x3916
STRING: The sound was, however, accompanied by an excessively cold meaning.

LABEL: 0x396A
STRING: ――And I realized what it was.

LABEL: 0x3996
STRING: The reality of the matter.
